nodes.text: The Yaru was a large black military airship that was part of the Lost Tribe of Sith's Ebon Fleet in 2975 BBY. It was the flagship of the High Lord Korsin Bentado and was the largest vessel in the fleet. It was destroyed during the Invasion of Alanciar by the Alanciari Keshiri. However, Bentado and several Sith survived and regrouped, and succeeded in assassinating the War Cabinet, Alanciar's military government.
